mapper.select: SELECT d.department_name ,e.id ,e.name ,r.reply_content ,r.reply_dt ,r.reply_no ,c.complain_no ,c.complain_content ,c.complain_request ,c.progress ,c.complain_dt ,c.upload_dt ,c.complain_type ,c.customer_name ,c.phone ,c.complain_pwd FROM department d JOIN employees e ON d.department_no = e.department_no JOIN replys r ON e.id = r.id JOIN complains c ON c.complain_no = r.complain_no WHERE c.complain_no = #{complainNo}
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(reply_no), 0) + 1 FROM replys
INSERT INTO replys(reply_no ,reply_content ,reply_dt ,complain_no ,id) VALUES (#{replyNo} ,#{replyContent} ,sysdate ,#{complainNo} ,#{id})
